title: "Marvell COO Chris Koopmans on the intense demand for AI"
excerpt: "Marvell (Nasdaq: MRVL) is hitting the AI boom from two different angles. First is by helping companies design custom AI processors that go inside data centers. And, second, the less glamorous yet vital networking chips that move optical signals around cables that are needed to run AI applications inside of data centers."
